Climate, Weather and Environment 
================================


.. list-table:: Climate and Weather Datasets
   :widths: 5 30
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Code
     - Project Name 
   * - al33
     - CMIP5 replication
   * - oi10	
     - ESGF CMIP6 Replication Data
   * - qv56	
     - Reference Datasets for Climate Model Analysis/Forcing
   * - rq8	
     - CORDEX
   * - rr3	
     - ESGF Publication
   * - fx1	
     - Atmospheric Forcing Products
   * - gd8	
     - Sydney Forecast Demonstration project
   * - gg6	
     - Tropical Cyclone Scenarios
   * - ig2	
     - NWP Bureau restricted data
   * - lb4	
     - ACCESS NWP APS2 reference data
   * - na3	
     - ACCESS NWP APS2 Development reference data
   * - ja4	
     - ACCESS NWP APS3 development reference data
   * - rr8	
     - Seasonal Climate Prediction
   * - hj10	
     - CPOL radar
   * - fj2	
     - TERN eMAST data assimilation
   * - rr5	
     - BoM Observations Reference data
   * - rr9	
     - eMAST TERN Data Collection
   * - rq0	
     - Advanced Radar products for Weather and Climate Studies
   * - fx3	
     - eReefs Hydrodynamic model data products
   * - gb6	
     - OFAM - Ocean Forecasting Australia Model
   * - rq5	
     - Ocean Gen. Circulation Model (Earth Simulator)
   * - rr6	
     - BoM Ocean-Marine reference data
   * - dl1	
     - UM and GC model assessment
   * - fo0	
     - CSIRO-Mk3L-1-2 Model Output
   * - fs38	
     - ESGF CMIP6 Australian Data Publication
   * - gg8	
     - Severe Weather Case Studies
   * - gh5	
     - ACCESS-CM 0.25 degrees Simulations
   * - l45	
     - CDR-MIP for ESGF
   * - ma05	
     - Australian Regional Reanalysis (BARRA)
   * - p66	
     - ACCESS - AOGCM
   * - pj6

   * - rq7

   * - rq9	
     - AVHRR
   * - rr4
